text: Frank Bradford (October 21, 1941 â€“ February 2, 2022) was an American lawyer and politician. Bradford was born in Sumter, South Carolina. He was in the Georgia House of Representatives from 1997 to 1999. He was a Republican. Bradford died on February 2, 2022 in Smyrna, Georgia at the age of 80.Frank Bradford-obituary'Members of the Georgia General Assembly-Senate and House of Representatives-Second Session of 1997-1998 Term, Georgia General Assembly, Atlanta, Georgia, Biographical Sketch of Frank Bradford, pg. 51 ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2022 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Lawyers from South Carolina Category:Politicians from South Carolina Category:Lawyers from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Politicians from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Frank Bradford
